field.name: summary
field.value: Routing Engine: support for root-routing + excluding MonoRail resource files from routing

field.name: description
field.value:
The attached patch applies two changes to the routing engine: 1. Url matching - Assign 1 point for each assigned default url part - Increased number of points for matched parts from 2/4 (dynamic/static) to 2000/4000 2. Exclude monorail static resource files (i.e. app relative urls starting with /monorail/files) from routing
The first change allows routing of the appliaction root (e.g. http://server/ ) to default areas/controllers/actions
